articles.content: TAROUBA: A second-string India thrashed West Indies by 200 runs in the third One-day International on Tuesday to seal a 2-1 series victory in a timely boost ahead of their Asia Cup campaign next mont… [+3286 chars]

articles.title: Jake Paul predicts 5th-round knockout of Nate Diaz: ‘Weather the storm and end his career’ - MMA Fighting
articles.description: Jake Paul is calling his shot for Saturday’s big boxing match with Nate Diaz.
articles.content:
Jake Paul is calling his shot for Saturdays big boxing match with Nate Diaz.
My prediction is a fifth-round knockout, Paul said Wednesday on The MMA Hour.
